data.text: Live from 🇧🇩: @AntonioGuterres & @WorldBank's @JimYongKim talked to @melissarfleming about what they saw in Cox's Bazar on Monday. https://t.co/3mQQIEqAg7 https://t.co/jLbkVpUrMS

900k+ Rohingya refugees are living in terrible circumstances. When I see young boys & girls here I imagine seeing my own granddaughters living in these conditions. 

My appeal to the int’l community is to step up support. 
-@antonioguterres in Bangladesh https://t.co/YZHa55uypA

It’s impossible to visit these refugee camps, listening to stories of violence, rape, torture, houses burnt - terrible human rights violations - without your heart breaking for the suffering of the Rohingya people. 
-- @antonioguterres in Bangladesh https://t.co/oI7CX2oHSo
Continues this week at @UNGeneva: Human Rights Council, Thirty-eighth session. Follow @UN_HRC & see: https://t.co/WnaR4Jouhs #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/nlr4ho7YLp
Starts this week in @UNGeneva: Human Rights Committee, Documents, report & other materials are online here: https://t.co/BHkQ9Lpn3C #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/XbKnmAnxre
Starts this week & continues through 10 August at @UNGeneva: International Law Commission ⚖️. Details here: https://t.co/wn7LPej1lz https://t.co/3dTH9IvKBP

Who's visiting Bangladesh right now to spotlight the perils facing Rohingya refugees?
✅ @UN Secretary-General @AntonioGuterres
✅ @WorldBank’s @JimYongKim
✅ @UNFPA's @Atayeshe
✅ UNHCR @Refugees's  @RefugeesChief
https://t.co/FPiRCb3yka

In a world where so many borders are closed, the people of Bangladesh have opened theirs to Rohingya families – see more from @AntonioGuterres's visit on @instagram: https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU. https://t.co/P3KmfpFXSg

In 2015, 450K people died as result of drug use. We need strengthened global efforts to counter the global drug problem to achieve the #GlobalGoals. New @UNODC World Drug Report: https://t.co/LLfBLmXz3b #WDR18 https://t.co/kY3STYFygM
After meeting with refugees in Cox's Bazar on Monday, @AntonioGuterres & @JimYongKim will take your questions live on Facebook. All info is here: https://t.co/9IDLpj1awk https://t.co/uJXsQTe1TU

UN Peacekeepers leave their families behind and travel to some of the most hostile environments on the planet to help others. Info on @UNPeacekeeping is here: https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/uRHrlNHaGr

What do fashion & waste management have in common in Sierra Leone? 

@UNDP shows one innovative way to help boost local economies & #BeatPlasticPollution ➡ https://t.co/XCb28y0Q4s https://t.co/P1Yri6gATu

Until conditions are in place for a voluntary and sustainable return, refugees – and their hosts in Bangladesh – will continue to need the support of the international community.  https://t.co/FKsuFXk7aE

Ahead of arrival of @antonioguterres in Cox's Bazar, our #SocialUN team talked to @WFP & @refugees about work to help Rohingya families affected by monsoon rains in 🇧🇩. See latest @instagram story: https://t.co/h1O6fCINp5 https://t.co/tNGcfpWHHf

Sport for peace! Former FARC-EP combatants & community members played a football/soccer match organized by @MisionONUCol as a symbol of reconciliation in Colombia. See more 📸 here: https://t.co/PJe280C1ei https://t.co/U5fNooJeNh

A new formulation of a drug to prevent excessive bleeding following childbirth could save thousands of women’s lives.

An important update from @WHO is now online ⬇️ https://t.co/phlD9nQyBM

.@AntonioGuterres is Bangladesh to express solidarity with the Rohingya refugees & people there who have been so generous, especially the local communities in Cox’s Bazar. 

You can help, too. Here is how ⬇️ https://t.co/NQ4P28Cc8S

🏭 Every job in manufacturing creates 2+ jobs in other sectors. The #GlobalGoals aim to build infrastructure, promote industrialization and foster innovation: https://t.co/ouSvvlQJQc https://t.co/j9Gg0p0M9S
Sunday: Sweden takes on rotating presidency of the Security Council for the month of July. Follow @SwedenUN & #SwedeninUNSC for updates: https://t.co/UL9ul1NWIA https://t.co/k7lXY6U2qJ
The unpaid care burden continues to fall upon women. To achieve gender equality & #GlobalGoals, @ILO calls on all to value women’s unpaid care work. https://t.co/cfYRiYE4gX https://t.co/qbvgyu7Jow

Zambia provides over 1000 military & police officers to @UNPeacekeeping.
We thank these brave men and women for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/wLJi8f3Cgh

Women make up 30% of parliaments today. 
@IPUparliament works to promote women's participation & gender equality. Find out more on #WorldParliamentDay: https://t.co/D4cpDxzndQ https://t.co/bRAyguhFqR
Why is #AsteroidDay celebrated on 30 June? How does the @UNOOSA work to mitigate asteroid impact hazard & promote public safety?  @SDiPippo_OOSA has the answers: https://t.co/Dug0Kw5fmy

#MandelaDay is next month! 100 years after his birth, Nelson Mandela's call to "ensure that democracy, peace & prosperity prevail everywhere" continues to inspire the 🌍. See this year's events: https://t.co/njn76L09CG https://t.co/Il5uGtUBhi
New #SupportSahel plan covers 10 countries: Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Chad, Gambia, Guinea, Mali, Mauritania, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal. https://t.co/UgvAzkNP5s https://t.co/eJdhbLqbgr
On #AsteroidDay, see how @UNOOSA works to help identify & counter asteroid impact hazards: https://t.co/qfRlNywWWT https://t.co/mEqDvEguoe

31M people using drugs suffer from related disorders & need treatment. Read the latest trends in supply, use & health consequences of drugs in new @UNODC World Drug Report: https://t.co/LLfBLnf9UJ #WDR18 https://t.co/oF8CSR2mkz

.@IPUparliament works with parliaments to safeguard peace & drive positive democratic change through political dialogue and concrete action. Saturday is #WorldParliamentDay: https://t.co/D4cpDxhLPg https://t.co/h8LrR0OKti

Ahead of @AntonioGuterres & @JimYongKim visit, @WorldBank announces that Rohingya refugees will benefit from ~ $500M in grants to help Bangladesh address their health, education, water & sanitation, disaster risk management & social protection needs https://t.co/iqNLlIrM3u https://t.co/g67sx121nz

Saturday is #AsteroidDay. Near-Earth objects (NEOs) represent potentially catastrophic threats to our planet & require global cooperation in the interest of public safety. https://t.co/Oa6x4XfsFa https://t.co/yi7ihUWikm

To stay ahead of terrorists, @AntonioGuterres closes #UNitetoCounterTerrorism event by calling on int'l community, private sector & academia to share knowledge, expertise & resources to prevent new technologies becoming lethal terrorist weapons. https://t.co/vW0ustwR1T

No dog bites = No rabies
Vaccinate dogs & learn their body language to save human lives. @WHO has more info: https://t.co/5WOxtJSdzH https://t.co/G2qOIEjf3F
News: António Manuel de Carvalho Ferreira Vitorino, of Portugal, elected as new @UNmigration Director General. Info here: https://t.co/loWHssU3QE https://t.co/OaCVw77NXh
The Tropics account for 40% of the world’s total surface area and are host to approximately 80% of the world’s biodiversity. Friday is #TropicsDay: https://t.co/oatcNZvYop https://t.co/oC2lQJyNED
Watch now as civil society representatives address attendees at the #UNitetoCounterTerrorism event in NYC: https://t.co/XQASc5zb9b https://t.co/XnsxaZDVXp

The Tropics have high levels of poverty, with more people undernourished than in the rest of the 🌎. Friday is #TropicsDay: https://t.co/oatcNZvYop https://t.co/qMinvsIeoR
Friday: Council of @UNmigration convenes in Geneva to hold a vote for the election of its next Director General. Background info is here: https://t.co/WmcCeIT3cp https://t.co/dl4HggpvGj
At the UN, women are inspiring women all over the 🌎. Meet some of these leaders in our latest @instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/JyZCmIqYbS

"No cause or grievance can justify terrorism. But we will only diminish the threat by ending the conflicts, human rights abuses, poverty & exclusion that drive so many to violent extremism" – @AntonioGuterres https://t.co/RNz9WqyVYb https://t.co/Kn0k6SnKfP

Attacks on journalists are attacks on freedom of expression. @UNESCO has resources online with information on how to support free, independent & quality journalism https://t.co/fXyyqdnfv4 #JournalistSafety #EndImpunity
Tropical nations have made significant progress, but face challenges to achieve the #GlobalGoals. This is why Friday's #TropicsDay matters: https://t.co/oatcNZNzfX https://t.co/572XYtRsMN
News: @AntonioGuterres to visit Rohingya refugees in Bangladesh to highlight the country's generosity & the need for more international support https://t.co/eJxfybskvC https://t.co/elLGhW7NCq

Terrorism is a complex global challenge that has reached unprecedented levels affecting every country.

Here is what @AntonioGuterres said opening the 1st-ever #UNitetoCounterTerrorism event in NYC: https://t.co/KJpGJKhSvV https://t.co/bW5hBCb5G1
LIVE now: 1st-ever #UNitetoCounterTerrorism event to foster cooperation & information sharing. Watch: https://t.co/oNYIb3ZiB0 https://t.co/xpAVM647Km

Yemen: After 3 years of conflict, more than 75% of the population need humanitarian assistance. @UNOCHA coordinates aid operations to help the most vulnerable: https://t.co/Z6wh0ndTNA https://t.co/6SABOzNmVi

Sustainable industry, inclusive innovation & resilient infrastructure are 🔑 to achieving the #GlobalGoals & creating a better 🌍 for everyone. See how here: https://t.co/ouSvvlz8rC https://t.co/28joepStOa

In a trade war, everyone loses. 
Its effects are felt beyond those countries directly involved &  exporters face higher tariffs everywhere. More info from @UNCTAD: https://t.co/odmpSc8GgD https://t.co/gnkktvhDTs

Now online: latest @childreninwar report covers 20 countries, including crises such as Syria, Yemen and Afghanistan, but also situations in countries such as India, the Philippines and Nigeria. https://t.co/PlcGHbYjNw

"We need more women in all areas of our work if we are to meet the challenges we currently face" -- @antonioguterres on the launch of "HERstory," a book celebrating women leaders at the UN. https://t.co/GOO6KuuJuz https://t.co/ZSeKeXPNIV

1st-ever conference of counter-terrorism agencies to foster cooperation & information sharing starts Thursday at UNHQ. Details here: https://t.co/RVJjp1JqDK #UNitetoCounterTerrorism https://t.co/squkAoAfuE

"We the peoples..."

"Torture remains unacceptable & unjustified at all times, including during states of emergency, political instability, or even in a war." -- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's Intl Day in Support of Victims of Torture. https://t.co/SBdXZVFAe9 https://t.co/VbsbQrcgZ5

"We need int'l cooperation & effective law enforcement responses to stop organized crime networks & drug traffickers, with full respect for human rights and in accordance with int'l standards & norms." -- @antonioguterres on #WorldDrugDay https://t.co/PQGqPXPmGi https://t.co/7V9LhB5Bsk

A 🌎 free of drug abuse requires global action. On Tuesday's #WorldDrugDay, @UNODC calls on all countries to step up efforts to #ListenFirst to children & youth to prevent drug use: https://t.co/pjbUTBvHZc https://t.co/pGN10YIYyJ

Torture is a crime under international law. Tuesday is the International Day in Support of Victims of Torture. Get more info here: https://t.co/SBdXZVXbCJ https://t.co/rPqRkD6zCu

"Millions of Palestine refugees are counting on us to relieve their suffering & to help them to build a better future. They are counting on us for action now." -- @antonioguterres. Support @UNRWA's work #ForPalestineRefugees ➡️ https://t.co/64pvvom6TM https://t.co/nplg1Gch0W

In many parts of the 🌍 widowhood makes women vulnerable to harmful practices. @UN_Women & @UNTrustFundEVAW work to ensure widows'  rights are protected. Here’s an example from Togo:  https://t.co/TTiUyOlalX  #WidowsDay https://t.co/yyY48Qof6w

"Women in post-conflict countries find it easier to relate their stories to women peacekeepers" --@unmissmedia Police Commissioner on the role of women in @unpeacekeeping. Watch her interview at this week's #UNCOPS: https://t.co/FYQejeMedi https://t.co/95hgZTNaTt
This week, @antonioguterres went to Norway 🇳🇴 and Russia 🇷🇺. For a glimpse behind-the-scenes of his trip, check out our latest @instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/Utvegizwta

On Saturday's UN Public Service Day, we thank all who dedicate their lives to serving others. https://t.co/cEP7h85LRU #UNPSA2018 https://t.co/o34IVHE94J

There are about 285 million widows globally. Nearly half of them live in poverty. On #WidowsDay & every day, let’s support widows’ rights so they have the opportunity to build a new life after personal loss. https://t.co/ZIAKu2ran7 https://t.co/x7dxXQBcEx
